description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任中国人民解放军陆军第三十八集团军军长、国防大学副校长、沈阳军区副司令员、北部战区副司令员兼参谋长等职。
description.en: A lieutenant general in the People's Liberation Army of China, who has served as Commander of the 38th Group Army, Vice President of the National Defense University, Deputy Commander of the Shenyang Military Region, and Deputy Commander and Chief of Staff of the Northern Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 河南省禹州市下辖的镇，为王西欣的出生地。
description.en: A town under the jurisdiction of Yuzhou, Henan Province, and the birthplace of Wang Xixin.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十七集团军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十七集团军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军下属的集团军，王西欣曾在此长期服役并担任军长。
description.en: A group army of the People's Liberation Army Ground Force where Wang Xixin served for a long time and held the position of corps commander.

description.zh-cn: 1979年至1990年中国与越南之间爆发的战争，王西欣曾参与此战。
description.en: A war between China and Vietnam from 1979 to 1990, in which Wang Xixin participated.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军陆军指挥学院

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军指挥学院

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军的一所军事院校，王西欣在此获得本科学历。
description.en: A military academy of the PLA Ground Force where Wang Xixin obtained his bachelor's degree.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军国防大学

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军国防大学

description.zh-cn: 中国最高军事学府，王西欣曾在此学习并获得硕士学位，后担任副校长。
description.en: The highest military academy in China, where Wang Xixin studied and obtained a master's degree, and later served as its vice president.

zh-cn: 总参谋部高等军事学院

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯的一所著名军事院校，王西欣曾在此留学。
description.en: A renowned military academy in Russia where Wang Xixin studied.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军陆军第八十二集团军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第八十二集团军
中国人民解放军陆军第三十八集团军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军下属的集团军，王西欣曾任该集团军军长。
description.en: A group army of the PLA Ground Force, where Wang Xixin served as corps commander.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军沈阳军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军沈阳军区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾设置的七个大军区之一，王西欣曾任该军区副司令员。
description.en: One of the seven former military regions of the People's Liberation Army, where Wang Xixin served as deputy commander.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的五大战区之一，王西欣曾任该战区副司令员兼参谋长。
description.en: One of the five theater commands of the People's Liberation Army, where Wang Xixin served as Deputy Commander and Chief of Staff.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，接替王西欣担任中国人民解放军陆军第三十八集团军军长。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army who succeeded Wang Xixin as commander of the 38th Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，接替王西欣担任中国人民解放军北部战区参谋长。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army who succeeded Wang Xixin as Chief of Staff of the Northern Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，王西欣在中国人民解放军沈阳军区副司令员职位上的前任。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, Wang Xixin's predecessor as the Deputy Commander of the Shenyang Military Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，王西欣在中国人民解放军国防大学副校长职位上的前任。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, Wang Xixin's predecessor as the Vice President of the National Defense University.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，接替王西欣担任中国人民解放军国防大学副校长。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army who succeeded Wang Xixin as the Vice President of the National Defense University.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，王西欣在中国人民解放军陆军第三十八集团军军长职位上的前任。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, Wang Xixin's predecessor as the Commander of the 38th Group Army.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军成都军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军成都军区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾设置的七个大军区之一，王西欣早年在此军区下辖的第十三军服役。
description.en: One of the seven former military regions of the People's Liberation Army. Wang Xixin served in the 13th Army under its jurisdiction in his early years.

relationships.target: 花石镇 (禹州市)
中国人民解放军陆军第七十七集团军

description.zh-cn: 1974年参军，在成都军区第十三军一四九师四四六团当战士。
description.en: Enlisted in 1974 and served as a soldier in the 446th Regiment, 149th Division, 13th Army of the Chengdu Military Region.

relationships.target: 中越战争

description.zh-cn: 王西欣曾参加中越战争。
description.en: Wang Xixin participated in the Sino-Vietnamese War.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军指挥学院

degree.zh-cn: 合同战役指挥专业硕士
degree.en: Master's degree in Joint Campaign Command

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十七集团军
伏龙芝军事学院

description.zh-cn: 2002年，被派往俄罗斯总参谋部高等军事学院高级研修班留学半年。
description.en: In 2002, he was sent to study at the advanced training course of the Military Academy of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Russia for half a year.

position.en: Deputy Commander and Chief of Staff

relationships.target: 王西欣

description.zh-cn: 许林平接替王西欣出任中国人民解放军陆军第三十八集团军军长。
description.en: Xu Linping succeeded Wang Xixin as commander of the 38th Group Army of the People's Liberation Army.

relationships.target: 王西欣

description.zh-cn: 石正露接替王西欣出任中国人民解放军北部战区参谋长。
description.en: Shi Zhenglu succeeded Wang Xixin as Chief of Staff of the PLA Northern Theater Command.

relationships.target: 王晓军

description.zh-cn: 王西欣接替王晓军出任中国人民解放军沈阳军区副司令员。
description.en: Wang Xixin succeeded Wang Xiaojun as Deputy Commander of the PLA Shenyang Military Region.

relationships.target: 任海泉

description.zh-cn: 王西欣接替任海泉出任中国人民解放军国防大学副校长。
description.en: Wang Xixin succeeded Ren Haiquan as Vice President of the PLA National Defense University.

relationships.target: 王西欣

description.zh-cn: 毕京京接替王西欣出任中国人民解放军国防大学副校长。
description.en: Bi Jingjing succeeded Wang Xixin as Vice President of the PLA National Defense University.

relationships.target: 李少军

description.zh-cn: 王西欣接替李少军出任中国人民解放军陆军第三十八集团军军长。
description.en: Wang Xixin succeeded Li Shaojun as commander of the 38th Group Army of the People's Liberation Army.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十七集团军
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军成都军区

description.zh-cn: 第十三集团军（现第七十七集团军）曾隶属于成都军区。
description.en: The 13th Group Army (now the 77th Group Army) was formerly subordinate to the Chengdu Military Region.
